title: Elon Musk
summary: Elon Musk is a businessman and entrepreneur known for his leadership of Tesla, SpaceX, Twitter, and xAI.

quiz.question: Where was Elon Musk born?
quiz.explanation: Elon Musk was born in Pretoria, South Africa.

quiz.question: What was the name of the company co-founded by Elon Musk in 1995?
quiz.explanation: Elon Musk co-founded the software company Zip2 in 1995.

quiz.question: What is the name of the neurotechnology company co-founded by Elon Musk in 2016?
quiz.explanation: Elon Musk co-founded the neurotechnology company Neuralink in 2016.

quiz.question: Who did Elon Musk support in the 2024 U.S. presidential election?
quiz.explanation: Elon Musk supported Donald Trump in the 2024 U.S. presidential election.

quiz.question: What was the estimated net worth of Elon Musk as of February 2026?
quiz.explanation: The estimated net worth of Elon Musk as of February 2026 was around US$852 billion.

quiz.question: What is the name of the online payment company co-founded by Elon Musk that later merged to form PayPal?
quiz.explanation: Elon Musk co-founded the online payment company X.com, which later merged to form PayPal.

quiz.question: What is the name of the tunneling company founded by Elon Musk in 2017?
quiz.explanation: Elon Musk founded the tunneling company The Boring Company in 2017.
